title: comebuy2
author: comebuy2
content: When my left and right-hand sides were discussing about CZ and SBF, another piece of news caught my eyeballs. https://twitter.com/BOSAGORA1/status/1590198041285644289?s=20&t=G7dN10gu0kkiIz5AdbMy_A I can't believe BOA can have a chance to meet Charles and Tamara (ADA) after announcing Mainnet is soon. Don't you think things make sense? At least BOA will start calling the node operator, then the operator can vote for a better ecosystem. Â  What do you think about BOA + ADA? Btw, they are conducting two airdrop campaigns, a snapshot $10,000 airdrop, and a free $2,000 airdrop. You only need to follow their Twitter and join their telegram community. That's allhttps://twitter.com/BOSAGORA1/status/1589482863447379968?s=20&t=Xl-TAK729shjx_KsRajeYA
